name: connections (itch) (MakovWait)
description:
Description:

Hello! My godot wild jam#21 submission here. 

This game is about connections, hunger and rage.

Fill free to play!

Contols:

WASD - movement

SPACE - jump

E - pick up item

F - throw item

Q - switch items

CTRL - crouch

SHIFT - tackle

LMB - use item 

RMB - leave the connected body

Used assets:

https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-robot-tileset
